oc get clusterversion
oc version
oc get subs openshift-gitops-operator -n openshift-operators -o yaml
oc get subs openshift-gitops-operator -n openshift-operators -o json
oc get subs openshift-gitops-operator -n openshift-operators
oc get pods -n openshift-gitops
oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/cluster-54f5bcdc85-mhbvh
oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/cluster-54f5bcdc85-mhbvh -o yaml
oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/cluster-54f5bcdc85-mhbvh -o json
oc -n openshift-gitops logs pod/cluster-54f5bcdc85-mhbvh
oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/kam-7d7bfc8675-s79l8
oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/kam-7d7bfc8675-s79l8 -o yaml
oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/kam-7d7bfc8675-s79l8 -o json
oc -n openshift-gitops logs pod/kam-7d7bfc8675-s79l8

oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/openshift-gitops-application-controller-0 -o yaml
oc -n openshift-gitops get pod/openshift-gitops-application-controller-0 -o json
oc -n openshift-gitops logs pod/openshift-gitops-application-controller-0

oc get applicationsets.argoproj.io -n openshift-gitops
oc get events -n openshift-gitops --field-selector type=Warning
oc get events -n openshift-gitops --field-selector type=Error

oc logs deployment/openshift-gitops-redis -n openshift-gitops
oc logs deployment/openshift-gitops-dex-server -n openshift-gitops
oc get namespaces --selector=argocd.argoproj.io/managed-by=openshift-gitops
